title: SBM Bank India announces key appointments in corporate, retail segments
description: SBM Bank India has named Prakash Jaiswal as head of corporate banking and Nikhil Rajadhyaksha as head of Retail Banking. Jaiswal previously worked at HSBC Bank India, while Rajadhyaksha was with Kotak Securities. SBM Bank India operates 17 branches across the country, including a new one in Surat.
